item.title: Help with codes
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

dont change all the {'s to ('s, just change the last ) to a {
and, search for a code like “notedbarrows” and put it after the last { on there

item.title: Help with codes
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

don’t put the code as “::dragon” or you will have to type “::::dragon” for it to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with codes
item.dc:creator: @ancientmage ancientmage
item.description:
@ancientmage wrote:

ok you will get an error any ways::

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::dragon") && playerRights >=0&& (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
sendMessage(“pimped junk”);
addItem(1149,1);
addItem(1187,1);
addItem(3148,1);
)

(you will need to change this ) to this } for it to work and it goes in your client when it opens up click ctrl and f then look for “sweet” or “master” and just past it under 1 of them hope i was some help for you

Read full topic

item.title: Help with codes
item.dc:creator: @def_leppard def leppard
item.description:
@def_leppard wrote:

ok i got a code generator and can make codes like this example 1

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::dragon") && playerRights >=0&& (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
sendMessage(“pimped junk”);
addItem(1149,1);
addItem(1187,1);
addItem(3148,1);
)
i need to know where to put it like if an owner sends me thier client/source and i wanna edit it and put codes in it where would they go exactly??

Read full topic
